snippet: Mixed-race families are absent from our screens.
abstract: Dispatch column by Jenna Wortham posits that vitriolic criticism of television commercial for General Mills Cheerios cereal, featuring a mixed-race family, suggests that there is a denial of the reality that the face of America is changing, and fast; notes that it is rare for interracial families to appear on television shows, even as multiracial characters have become more common.
lead_paragraph: Mixed-race families are absent from our screens.

headline.main: Where Is My Family on TV?
headline.print_headline: Where Is My Family on TV?
